net.sourceforge.taglets.impl.loader
Class MemoryURLConnection

java.lang.Object
  java.net.URLConnection
      net.sourceforge.taglets.impl.loader.MemoryURLConnection

public class MemoryURLConnection
extends URLConnection

URL connection that serves data from a memory source.

The memory connection serves data from a byte array specified at construction time for a pseudo URL.

Version:
1.7 (2008/03/30 12:43:18)
Maintainer:
Bruno Essmann <essmann@sourceforge.net>
Since:
1.4.1

Constructor Detail

MemoryURLConnection

public MemoryURLConnection(URL url,
                           String name,
                           byte[] data)
Creates a new memory connection for the specified pseudo URL and the name, data pair given.

Parameters:
url - the pseudo URL served by this memory connection.
name - the file name of the data to be served.
data - the data content of this connection.
